department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: This course will take a practical approach in exploring numerical analysis and related methods. With the increase of computer power and associated decrease in costs over the past few decades, the role and applicability of numerical analysis has also received more attention. It is therefore the aim of this course to not only discuss numerical methods, the related error analysis, but also to employ the use of MATLAB to allow the students to have hands-on experience in implementing such analyses.
goal.ch: 本課程將採用務實的方法來探索數值分析和相關方法。隨著過去幾十年電腦運算能力的提升和相關成本的降低，數值分析的效能和適用性也受到了更多的關注。因此，本課程的目的不僅是討論數值方法以及相關的誤差分析，還將利用 MATLAB 讓學生親身體驗實施此類分析。

content.en:
Numerical methods, error analysis, exercises in MATLAB environment.
Topics that will be covered include:
1) Mathematical modeling
2) MATLAB operations
3) Error ＆ approximation
4) Root finding (closed ＆ open methods)
5) Optimization
6) Curve fitting ＆ trend analysis
7) Regressions
8) Fourier analysis
9) Polynomial interpolation
10) Splines
11) Integration
content.ch:
數值方法、誤差分析、MATLAB練習。
涵蓋的題目包括:
1) 數學模型
2) MATLAB操作
3) 誤差與近似
4) 尋根(關閉與開放方法)
5) 優化
6) 趨勢分析及曲線擬合
7) 回歸
8) 傅立葉分析
9) 多項式內插
10) 板條
11) 數值積分
